UniprotID	Q9NSI8-3
Accession	Q9NSI8;B3KWJ3;F8WAA1;Q8NFF7;Q9C041
EntryName	SAMN1_HUMAN
ProteinName	SAM domain-containing protein SAMSN-1 (Hematopoietic adaptor containing SH3 and SAM domains 1) (Nash1) (SAM domain, SH3 domain and nuclear localization signals protein 1) (SH3-SAM adaptor protein)
GeneName	SAMSN1 HACS1
Length	441
Function	Negative regulator of B-cell activation. Down-regulates cell proliferation (in vitro). Promotes RAC1-dependent membrane ruffle formation and reorganization of the actin cytoskeleton. Regulates cell spreading and cell polarization. Stimulates HDAC1 activity. Regulates LYN activity by modulating its tyrosine phosphorylation (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Cell projection; Ruffle
